channel.title: Kick of a press of a button not working

item.title: Kick of a press of a button not working
item.dc:creator: @axecutor9090 axecutor9090
item.description:
@axecutor9090 wrote:

i have a tab for staff members to kick people with a touch of a button, sadly its kicking the person who presses “kick” anyway to kick the person that is click on?

Kicktab();
					noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];
					noob.disconnected = true;
					noob.logoutButton = true;
}
